message.content:
cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with a problem of power allocation in communication channels, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The authors use a partially observable Markov decision process (MDP) to model the problem, which is a common tool in control theory (cs.SY). The problem also involves optimization, which is a topic in game theory (cs.GT) and mathematical programming (cs.MA). Finally, the authors use numerical methods to solve the problem, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG).
